The Husqvarna W520 is a professional-grade walk-behind mower with a Kawasaki engine, aluminum chassis, and high-capacity bagging. Its variable-speed AutoWalk drive and ergonomic design make it a suitable choice for users who prefer a walk-behind mower for larger residential lawns, but its higher price point may be a consideration.
